snippet: In his official visit to China, Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel encountered combative public warnings and private complaints that Beijing felt besieged by hostile neighbors.
abstract: Diplomatic Memo; United States Defense Sec Chuck Hagel, in his first official visit to China, tours the country's lone aircraft carrier; American officials interpret tour as a resolve to protect naval power, particularly in light of tension between Beijing and its neighbors over disputed islands in the East and South China Seas; displays of China's military power reveal some dividends from years of heavy investments.
lead_paragraph: In his official visit to China, Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel encountered combative public warnings and private complaints that Beijing felt besieged by hostile neighbors.

headline.main: During Hagel Visit, China Showed Its Military Might, and Its Frustrations
headline.print_headline: China Shows Its Military Might, and Its Frustrations
